channel.title: Titles not showing up
channel.description: Everything in BMS > resource > bms.[language].txt isn't showing up. I'm playing as BMS_Intro_Subject on BMS_Chapter_Title_6, and achievements and HUD hints aren't showing up at all. How do I fix this?

item.title: Titles not showing up
item.dc:creator: Lilgreenman
item.description:
Everything in BMS > resource > bms.[language].txt isn’t showing up. I’m playing as BMS_Intro_Subject on BMS_Chapter_Title_6, and achievements and HUD hints aren’t showing up at all. How do I fix this?

Read full topic
